comments: Portugal sucks. Bad people and boring country

Portugal sucks. Bad people and boring country

Ever since Air BnB became a thing, the prices of renting a house for a vacation in Algarve became stupid high, there are some houses that are priced at 1000 euros a night, that's 200 euros over minimum wage!
O meu país está uma merda e a culpa é da imigração
